feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 8:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
